title: Interest) Act 2020 (No.1 of 2020)), 31AB and 31AD (inserted by section 3 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Regulations
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Regulations 
relating to Certain Restrictions under Section 31A)(Covid-19)(Revocation) 
Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (regulations relating certain restriction section 31a)(covid-19)(revocation) regulation 2022

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No.1 of 2020)), 31AB and 31AD (inserted by section 3 of
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 22nd day of January
text_raw:
2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 22nd day of January 

2022 at 6.00 a.m.
text_norm: 2 regulation shall come operation 22nd day january 2022 6.00 a.m

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No.1 of 2020)), 31AB and 31AD (inserted by section 3 of
heading: 3. The following Regulations are revoked:
text_raw:
3. The following Regulations are revoked: 

(a) Regulation 4, in so far as it applies to the provisions specified at 
entries 6, 7, 8, and 9 of Column 1 of Schedule 1 to, and Regulation 
5 of, the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling 
Event Provisions) (Covid-19)(No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
219 of 2021); 

(b) 

Health 

the 
31A-Temporary 
Restrictions)(Covid-19)(No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 
2021);

1947 

Act 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [27] 3 

(c) 

the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) (Covid-19) 
(Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
385 of 2021); 

(d) 

the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A (6A))(Covid-19)(No.3) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 738 of 2021). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 January, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No.1 of 2020)), 31AB and 31AD (inserted by section 3 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These regulations revoke the majority of the Covid related public health 
restrictions including SIs 385 of 2021, 217 of 2021, 738 of 2021 and partially 
revokes SI 219 of 2021 with effect from 6am on Saturday the 22nd of January
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation revoke majority covid related public health restriction including si 385 2021 217 2021 738 2021 partially revoke si 219 2021 effect 6am saturday 22nd january
